channel.title: Teleblock help
channel.description:
how can i make the teleports not work at all? [i]example • i used a manhole to teleport me somewhere. • i have an object at a place they can reach • the object teleports you back to home with a reward[/i] how can i make it so that you cant teleport out of there?
please send me a code for it thanks

item.title: Teleblock help
item.dc:creator: @kidd619 kidd619
item.description:
@kidd619 wrote:

“more info”?
okay here is a bit more
i put a manhole at lummy and when you go down, i want them to not be able to teleport AT ALL, not even when they use a command like ::pk or ::home
because by doing that, there would be no point
and with a code, please tell me where i put it, or if i can just put it anywhere.
thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblock help
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua1 |Joshua|
item.description:
@_Joshua1 wrote:

For all teleports add

if (!isInGuild()) {
x = XCORD;
y = YCORD;
} else {
sM(“You cannot teleport in the guild!”)
}

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblock help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

I think he means (not the spell) unable to teleport from certain area(s).

E.G. If you wanted to make a guild a place to pk, and you could teleport out if you were going to die, how would you make it so you can’t teleport from the guild at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblock help
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua1 |Joshua|
item.description:
@_Joshua1 wrote:

More detail please? What do you mean you don’t want them to be able to use them if teleblocked or you don’t want them to be able to teleport away from there?

Read full topic

item.title: Teleblock help
item.dc:creator: @kidd619 kidd619
item.description:

how can i make the teleports not work at all?
example
• i used a manhole to teleport me somewhere.
• i have an object at a place they can reach
• the object teleports you back to home with a reward
